content: We are running Disrupt.Sydney 2022, Australia's premier disruption conference. Join us to challenge common sense, learn about new ways of thinking, and engage with our digital future(s) in fun and creative ways. Register here (with an exclusive $60 discount).

Missed another deadline for that special issue that your paper would have fit in perfectly? I've developed callsforpapers.org to help you stay on top of the latest calls for papers in the IS discipline.
PhD! I finally graduated from the UNSW Business School.
Excited to start as a lecturer (assistant professor) at The University of Sydney. Looking forward to joining an amazing team.
Paper with Dubravka Cecez-Kecmanovic, Daniel Schlagwein and Michael Cahalane accepted for presentation at the 42nd International Conference on Information Systems.
Paper with Gerit Wagner accepted for presentation at the 42nd International Conference on Information Systems.
Paper with Dubravka Cecez-Kecmanovic, Daniel Schlagwein and Michael Cahalane accepted for presentation at the 12th International Symposium on Process Organization Studies.
Paper with Gerit Wagner and Guy Pare accepted for publication in The Journal of Strategic Information Systems.
Paper with Gerit Wagner accepted for presentation at the 29th European Conference on Information Systems.
Paper with Gerit Wagner, Maria Roche, Guido Schryen, Alexander Benlian, Guy Pare and Mathieu Templier accepted for publication in Information & Management.
Paper with Gerit Wagner, Guido Schryen and Nik Hassan accepted for publication in Decision Support Systems.
Paper with Dubravka Cecez-Kecmanovic, Michael Cahalane and Daniel Schlagwein accepted for presentation at the 41st International Conference on Information Systems.
Paper with Gerit Wagner and Guido Schryen accepted for publication in Communications of the Association for Information Systems.
Extremely grateful to be accepted to attend the OCIS Doctoral Consortium at Academy of Management. Looking forward to inspiring faculty and enlightening discussions!
Paper with Nik Hassan and Gerit Wagner accepted for presentation at the 28th European Conference on Information Systems
Extremely grateful to be invited to speak about the identity of digital nomads at the 7in7 conference. Inspiring people and fantastic community!
Paper with Dubravka Cecez-Kecmanovic and Daniel Schlagwein accepted for presentation at the 40th International Conference on Information Systems.
Paper with Gerit Wagner accepted for presentation at the 40th International Conference on Information Systems.
Paper with Emrah Yasasin, Gerit Wagner und Guido Schryen accepted for publication by Computers & Security.
Great news! I was awarded the UNSW Business School 3MT People’s Choice Award for my PhD thesis about digital work.
Great news! I was awarded the first price of the UNSW Business School research fair with my poster on identity emergence among digital nomads.
Paper with Daniel Schlagwein and Dubravka Cecez-Kecmanovic accepted for presentation at the 27th European Conference on Information Systems.
Paper with Dubravka Cecez-Kecmanovic and Daniel Schlagwein accepted for presentation at the 11th International Symposium on Process Organization Studies.
Paper with Gerit Wagner and Guido Schryen accepted for presentation at the 39th International Conference on Information Systems.
Extremely grateful to attend the KIN summer school 2018. Inspiring faculty and enlightening discussions!
Great news! I was granted the Christa-Lindner award for my Master’s thesis at the University of Regensburg.
Paper with Gerit Wagner and Guido Schryen accepted for presentation at the 38th International Conference on Information Systems.
Excited to start my PhD journey at the School of Information Systems and Technology Management, UNSW Business School.
Great news! I was awarded the prestigious Scientia PhD Scholarship to conduct my PhD studies at the University of New South Wales, Sydney.
